name: Word Master Word Connect Game
description:
Do you enjoy the excitement of classic word games? Are you a real word puzzle game master?
DOWNLOAD the latest word connect puzzle game – for FREE！
Challenge your brain and vocabulary by connecting letters and finding as many hidden words as you can!
Word Master Word Connect Game is a fun and incredible word connect puzzle game that improves your vocabulary and spelling skills.



HOW TO PLAY
- Slide letter blocks to find the correct word.
- Collect extra words to get bonus gold coins.
- Find all words and fill in the cross-word blank space to complete the level.
- Use Hints when you get stuck
- Get Free Gold coins by watching an Ad


FEATURES:
★ Fun and addictive word connect game!
★ More than 1500 well-designed challenge levels to play!
★ Free gold coins to boost your gameplay
★ Improve your vocabulary while Relaxing your Mind
★ No time limit for playing offline games at any time.
★ Beautiful Themes to explore!
★Reveal Hidden Words, Collect Rewards


Now start your wonderful word connection journey and become a Word Master!
